title: Whistler Bike Park on a Stooge Dirt Bomb
content:
Jeff Kendall-Weed took his Stooge Cycles Dirt Bomb to Whistler Bike Park’s opening weekend. While there, he hits 30 mph on the rigid MTB… Check it out for yourself!

The post Whistler Bike Park on a Stooge Dirt Bomb appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
